user_query: I'm planning a hiking trip with my friends and we want to create personalized meal plans for each of us. Can you help us generate meal plans based on our dietary preferences and any specific dietary restrictions we may have? Additionally, we would like to calculate the Body Mass Index (BMI) for each person using their weight and height. Finally, recommend some fasting centers near the hiking trail for those interested in intermittent fasting.

TaskList.description: Gather each individual's dietary preferences and restrictions.
Generate personalized meal plans based on the gathered dietary preferences and restrictions.
Collect weight and height information for each person to calculate BMI.
Calculate Body Mass Index (BMI) for each individual using their weight and height.
Identify and suggest fasting centers near the hiking trail for those interested in intermittent fasting.
